name: a green little window
description:
Play with the arrow keys of the keyboard.
Try to finish the two levels of each of the ten games.

A game by Léon Lenclos, the text is by Samah Slim.

Made at the Kalthoum Palace between 2020 and 2021.

http://www.leonlenclos.net/
http://samahslim.net/

https://itch.io/jam/vmj2020
